description:
misc/dist: prepare source archives

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5756066/diff/1/misc/dist/bindist.go
File misc/dist/bindist.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5756066/diff/1/misc/dist/bindist.go#newcode84
misc/dist/bindist.go:84: Source bool
// if true, OS and Arch are ignored
?

(or must be blank, rather?)

http://codereview.appspot.com/5756066/diff/1/misc/dist/bindist.go#newcode126
misc/dist/bindist.go:126: version     string // eg, "weekly.2012-03-04"
s/eg, //

It's obviously an example. And it would be e.g. anyway.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=77087995a659 ***
